message.apocalypsestarted: %1$s just started solar apocalypse! you have %2$s days to collect resource before they start to disappear; Good Luck!
message.apocalypse_already_triggered: Solar Apocalypse is already started, and theres no way to stop it.
message.gather_resource: Solar Apocalypse is already started! Collect As many resources as possible before sun fries everything!
message.apocalypsestarted.immidiate: %1$s just started solar apocalypse! resources are now started to disappear; Good Luck!
message.nosunlight: In order to start solar apocalypse, Pandora's lantern must be lit up under direct sunlight!
message.apocalypse_disabled: Apocalypse is disabled in config! Apocalypse will NOT begin.
